notes: Use TGN/AAT as cultural enrichment not structural geo authority
Place federation only if claim has place semantics
GeoNames favored for current population context
Political borders rely on modern containment unless historical evidence present
Trade-route and port claims often need both historical and modern place normalization
Physical features can persist across historical/modern states
Place federation optional unless concept is region-bound
Geo enrichment only for language-area claims
Battle/campaign claims need historical place anchors
Use Pleiades only when explicitly historical polity context exists
Sacred sites often historical-first with modern carryover
Place federation secondary except geo/earth sciences
Modern settlement/admin layers are primary for social metrics
Infrastructure claims may use modern place hierarchy
Network/media claims often align to modern admin geography
